name: OGA Rush
description:
Fight as an African hero who wants to free his people
Battle the Evil OGAs in the game jam submission and see if you are smart and lucky enough

How to play:

Click the draw button to draw a card from the deck. (max 5 cards per round). 

After drawing cards, Click on attack and tap the cards in the order you want to play. 

The sum of cards drawn from the deck should not exceed this value.

The value decreases with enemy health when the enemy health is less than the value. 

The player will attack the enemy with this value and add combos if any. 

There are 3 combo cards. Left Combo, Middle Combo and Right Combo are indicated by the shape position.
